description: Beginner friendly pav bhaji
ingredients: [{'name': 'potato', 'quantity': '3 medium'}, {'name': 'cauliflower', 'quantity': '1 cup'}, {'name': 'green peas', 'quantity': '1 cup'}, {'name': 'tomato', 'quantity': '2 medium'}, {'name': 'onion', 'quantity': '2 medium'}, {'name': 'capsicum', 'quantity': '1'}, {'name': 'pav bhaji masala', 'quantity': '2 tbsp'}, {'name': 'red chilli powder', 'quantity': '1 tsp'}, {'name': 'turmeric', 'quantity': '0.5 tsp'}, {'name': 'ginger garlic paste', 'quantity': '1 tbsp'}, {'name': 'butter', 'quantity': '2 tbsp'}, {'name': 'oil', 'quantity': '2 tbsp'}, {'name': 'salt', 'quantity': 'to taste'}]
steps: [{'order': 1, 'text': 'Peel and chop onions into very small pieces (pea-size).'}, {'order': 2, 'text': 'Wash and dice tomatoes into small cubes (Ludo dice size).'}, {'order': 3, 'text': 'Peel and cut potatoes into medium cubes (sugar-cube size).'}, {'order': 4, 'text': 'Remove capsicum seeds and chop into small cubes.'}, {'order': 5, 'text': 'Cut cauliflower into small florets (thumb-nail size).'}, {'order': 6, 'text': 'Boil potatoes, cauliflower, peas in pressure cooker for 3 whistles.'}, {'order': 7, 'text': 'In a pan, heat oil and butter; sauté onions till light brown, add ginger-garlic paste.'}, {'order': 8, 'text': 'Add tomatoes and spices; cook until soft and mushy.'}, {'order': 9, 'text': 'Add boiled veggies and mash with masher; add 0.5–1 cup water, simmer 10 minutes.'}, {'order': 10, 'text': 'Toast pav on tawa with butter until golden; serve with bhaji, chopped onion and lemon.'}]
title: Pav Bhaji - Super Easy
